scenario: In 2025, Charlie has wages of $65,536.06. Charlie also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $27,634.87 for the year. Charlie has passive income from another source of $17,224.93.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2025 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. Deductible: $17,224.93.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
